summary: The 'Barring Adversarial Networks and Notorious Extremist Destabilizers in Latin America Act' (BANNED in Latin America Act) mandates the Secretary of State to create a strategy within 180 days to counter Iranian and Hezbollah influence in Latin America. This strategy must address the proliferation of Iranian cultural centers, restrict travel of Iranian emissaries, strengthen US intelligence capabilities, disrupt Iranian and Hezbollah media platforms (like HispanTV and Al Mayadeen Espanol), and address the Al Mustafa International University network. The strategy will be submitted to the Foreign Affairs committees in both the House and Senate.
